document_data.mainbody:
ugen was a guard gnoll who served Akila, the Red Wizard khazark of the Thayan enclave in Neverwinter after the Shadow War of 1374 DR.
Following the Shadow War of the  and with the war with Luskan just two years prior, the economy and trade on the Sword Coast North were in shambled. Desperate to boost the commerce in the Jewel of the North, Nasher Alagondar opened the gates, conditionally, to a Thayan enclave. It was built on the Tyrs Eye plaza in Neverwinter, and aged Red Wizard Akila was appointed as its khazark. The offered Thayvian goods for trade, and Akilas enclave was staffed and guarded by gnolls. To no surprise, locals mistrusted the Red Wizard trade outpost. One individual from Neverwinter attempted to break in for some nefarious reason, but ended up trapped in the enclaves defensive contraptions. Even though the invader was freed by Mugen, the man fled from the Tyrs Eye in utter terror.
